Jobs

Work with us

We are looking for experienced and creative team members to join the Outbreak Data Analysis Platform (ODAP) team.

We are curating and driving research activities using COVID-19 data from various studies and institutions across the UK - including from the ISARIC4C; PHOSP-COVID and GenOMICC studies Analysis Platform.

We are currently recruiting for the following roles:

  • Data Analyst(s) Apply here

We are always interested to hear from experienced and enthusiastic data analysts, administrators, and project managers, so please get in touch with our study team for more information.
